languages.text: "А я и не говорю, что эта идея — хорошая. Но должно быть так, эттфатер".
"I am not saying it is a good idea. But it must be done, Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: "А я и не говорю, что эта идея — хорошая. Но должно быть так, эттфатер".

traits.locale_text: "I am not saying it is a good idea. But it must be done, Aett-Vater."

languages.text: “我没说这是个好主意，但我必须这么做，狼领。”
languages.original_text: "I am not saying it is a good idea. But it must be done, Aett-Vater."

languages.text: 「得策とは言ってないだろ。だが、やらなきゃならないんだ、アエット＝ヴァテル」
languages.original_text: "I am not saying it is a good idea. But it must be done, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: 「得策とは言ってないだろ。だが、やらなきゃならないんだ、アエット＝ヴァテル」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «No digo que sea buena idea, pero es lo que debemos hacer, Aett-Vater».
languages.original_text: "I am not saying it is a good idea. But it must be done, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: «No digo que sea buena idea, pero es lo que debemos hacer, Aett-Vater».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Je ne dis pas que c'est une bonne idée, mais c'est une nécessité, aett-vater. »
languages.original_text: "I am not saying it is a good idea. But it must be done, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne dis pas que c'est une bonne idée, mais c'est une nécessité, aett-vater. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Ich habe nicht behauptet, dass es eine ist. Aber es muss getan werden, Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: "I am not saying it is a good idea. But it must be done, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nicht behauptet, dass es eine ist. Aber es muss getan werden, Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "İyi bir fikir olduğunu söylemiyorum. Yapılması gerekiyor Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: "I am not saying it is a good idea. But it must be done, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: "İyi bir fikir olduğunu söylemiyorum. Yapılması gerekiyor Aett-Vater."
